data.title: Marge Piercy – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about Marge Piercy. Browse Marge Piercy’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.

Connie Ramos is a Mexican American woman living on the streets of New York. Once ambitious and proud, she has lost her child, her husband, her dignity....

4 out of 5 stars

Great story, needed a narrator who actually speaks Spanish

Epic in scope, Marge Piercy's sweeping novel encompasses the wide range of people and places marked by the Second World War. Each of her 10 narrators has a unique story....
